root.name: GodsWar Online
root.description: OverviewGodsWar Online's story is set in Ancient Greece where players can visit legendary Greek cities, and battle mythical monsters. There are 4 classes which the player can choose to play: the warrior, the mage, the champion and the priest. Classes Warrior: The warrior has a large amount of hitpoints, great physical and magical defense which makes it the tank of GodsWar Online. The warrior's weapons of choice are the sword and shield. Champion: The champion is the second melee class, but unlike the Warrior focuses on damage dealing. The champion uses a spear as a primary weapon. Mage: The mage uses magical spells to deal large amounts of damage, but suffers from a low physical defense. The mage channels its magic through a staff. Priest: The priest is capable of healing its allies, and wields a combination of wand and shield.
